en.name: Order Line Detail Total Shipments Metrics
en.description: Order Line Detail Inbound Total Shipments Metrics

devConfigurations.name: queries[0].fields
values: query TotalShipmentsMetrics( $tenantId: String, $orderLineId: String) { totalShipmentsNotShipped: businessObjects( hint: { viewId: "graph" }, simpleFilter: { tenantId: $tenantId, type: ShipmentLine }, advancedFilter: {AND: [ { EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "orderLine.id", type: STRING}, {VALUE: $orderLineId, type: STRING}]}, {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "order.orderType", type: STRING}, { VALUE: "INBOUND", type: STRING } ] }, { EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "shipment.statusByDate", type: STRING}, {VALUE: "NOT_SHIPPED", type: STRING } ] } ] }, aggregationParams: {dimension: {fieldPath: "orderLine.id", type: STRING}, reduce: { expression: {operator: COUNT, fieldPath: "shipment.id", type: FLOAT}, output: {resultAlias: "totalShipmentsNotShipped", type: INT} } } ) {aggregationResults { values { name numValue } } } totalShipmentsInTransit: businessObjects( hint: { viewId: "graph" }, simpleFilter: {tenantId: $tenantId, type: ShipmentLine }, advancedFilter: {AND: [{EQUALS: [{SELECT: "orderLine.id", type: STRING}, {VALUE: $orderLineId, type: STRING } ] }, {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "order.orderType", type: STRING}, {VALUE: "INBOUND", type: STRING } ] }, {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "shipment.statusByDate", type: STRING }, { VALUE: "IN_TRANSIT", type: STRING } ] } ] }, aggregationParams: { dimension: { fieldPath: "orderLine.id", type: STRING}, reduce: {expression: {operator: COUNT, fieldPath: "shipment.id", type: FLOAT}, output: { resultAlias: "totalShipmentsInTransit", type: INT } } } ) { aggregationResults { values { name numValue } } } totalShipmentsDelivered: businessObjects(hint: { viewId: "graph"}, simpleFilter: { tenantId: $tenantId, type: ShipmentLine }, advancedFilter: { AND: [ { EQUALS: [{SELECT: "orderLine.id", type: STRING}, {VALUE: $orderLineId, type: STRING } ] }, {EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "order.orderType", type: STRING }, {VALUE: "INBOUND", type: STRING } ] }, {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "shipment.statusByDate", type: STRING}, {VALUE: "DELIVERED", type: STRING } ] } ] }, aggregationParams: { dimension: { fieldPath: "orderLine.id", type: STRING}, reduce: { expression: {operator: COUNT, fieldPath: "shipment.id", type: FLOAT }, output: {resultAlias: "totalShipmentsInTransit", type: INT } } } ) { aggregationResults { values { name numValue } } } }
